mapper.insert: insert into SYSTEM_EDITOR (ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, CREATER, CREATETIME, MODIFYER, LASTMODIFYTIME, ISSHOW, FILEURL, BASENAME, CONTENT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastmodifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isshow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{basename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=CLOB})
mapper.update: update SYSTEM_EDITOR set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYER = #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTMODIFYTIME = #{lastmodifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSHOW = #{isshow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILEURL = #{fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BASENAME = #{basename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, CREATER, CREATETIME, MODIFYER, LASTMODIFYTIME, ISSHOW, FILEURL, BASENAME, CONTENT from SYSTEM_EDITOR where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
